channel.title: On-Demand Document Enhancement on Tafreed Ahmad
channel.description: Recent content in On-Demand Document Enhancement on Tafreed Ahmad

item.title: RealitySummary: Exploring On-Demand Mixed Reality Document Enhancement using Large Language Models
item.description: This paper presents RealitySummary, a mixed reality reading assistant that uses OCR and large language models to enhance physical and digital documents with on-demand summaries and augmentations.
